short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Intently is a Chrome extension that lets you create your realistic handwritten assignments in 2 minutes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Intently is a Chrome extension that lets you create your realistic handwritten assignments in 5 minutes. You can easily scan the QR after clicking on the Convert to assignment button and then customize the Writing, Page Backgrounds assignment on the app.
